commitResults.messageTitle: Update main function to store commands
Implement mark as done function and task class
commitResults.messageBody:
Because,
* the old method requires a more complicated 2-dimensional array.
* mark as done is a common behavior for all tasks (isDone).
* there is flexibility for future additions of other functions and
parameters associated with the task (object).

The mark as done done feature is added to allow users to mark their
tasks as done. Instead of using a 2-dimensional array which is
complicated and inflexible, I changed the storage of tasks from array
(String) to class (Task). Task contains a description of the task
(description) and a boolean to track whether a task is completed
(isDone). Primarily, this commit implements the mark as done command
and changed the tasks from string to an object.

This commit should make future implementation of other functions easier.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code syntax to follow standard
Add task classification, completion date and refractor code
commitResults.messageBody:
Because,
* the old structure is very difficult to read and interpret.
* the classification of task is difficult to implement with the current
approach since each category has some common and some unique features.
* there is flexibility for future additions of other functions and
parameters associated with the task (object).

Let's add a few features in this update. Firstly, tasks are now
classified into 3 different categories - todo, deadline and event.

Todo, Deadline and Event classes have some common behaviors (e.g.
description, isDone). The common behaviors across these classes cause
code duplication.

Extracting the common behavior into a super class allows us to use
polymorphism when managing a task. For example, the checking of task
status can be done for all categories of tasks in one loop.

Let's pull up behaviors common to all task attribute classes into the
parent class called Task and keep the unique attributes in each child
class.

Inheritance is used in this situation because it is simple to code and
understand. This method is also flexible to new features.

Secondly, the code is refactored to make us understand and interpret
the code easier.

Magic numbers are extracted to global constants to explain the use of
each number better. The readability is also enhanced with the
structural change. Some error handling is also implemented to enhance
usability and reliability, and makes the application more responsive.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code syntax to follow standard
Update code syntax based on feedback
